entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:20 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:20 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
